Package sabina

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Filter.Handler
    This is just a "type alias".
    Route.Handler
    This is just a "type alias".
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Action
    Functionality used in both Route and Filter.
    Fault<T extends java.lang.Exception>  
    Filter
    A Filter is built up by a path (for url-matching) and the implementation of the 'handle' method.
    Request
    Provides information about the HTTP request
    Response
    Provides functionality for modifying the response.
    Route
    A Route is built up by a path (for url-matching) and the implementation of the 'handle' method.
    Sabina
    Static methods to handle the default server (singleton server)
    Server
    The main building block of a Sabina application is a set of routes.
    Session
    Provides session information.

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    HaltException
    Exception used for stopping the execution.
